Please use the below mentioned link for Registration: https://bit.ly/2SkQxEq Walk-in Date: 20th July, 2019 Time: 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM Interview Venue: Daffodil Software Private Limited 9th floor, Tower B1, SEZ DLF Silokhera, Sector 30, Gurugram, Haryana Nearest Metro Station- Huda City Center Landmark-Star Mall, NH 8, Gurgaon Contact Person : Swati Chahar
